# livePhoto

**Type Property**

A type that represents Live Photos.

## Declaration

```swift
static var livePhoto: UTType { get }
```

## Discussion

The identifier for this type is `com.apple.live-photo`.

This type conforms to [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypeImage].

## Apple image formats

- **heic**: A type that represents High Efficiency Image Coding images.
- **heif**: A type that represents High Efficiency Image File Format images.
